## Professional Summary

I am a post-doctoral researcher developing Clinical Decision Support Systems (CDSS) for PTSD detection through Natural Language Processing. I hold a Ph.D. in Computer Science from EPHE and lead the 150k€ CNRS-funded TALANT project on trauma language analysis.

## Research Interests

Natural Language Processing for mental health • Psycholinguistics • Trauma and PTSD • Formal Thought Disorder • Explainable AI • LLM • Clinical Decision Support System (CDSS) • Digital humanities
